import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { MOCK_SKILL_SUGGESTIONS, MOCK_COURSES } from '../data/mockData'; const CourseMapping = () => { const [targetDomain, setTargetDomain] = useState(''); const [courseTitle, setCourseTitle] = useState(''); const [courseDescription, setCourseDescription] = useState(''); const [learningOutcomes, setLearningOutcomes] = useState(''); const [results, setResults] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const addDomain = (domain) => { setTargetDomain(domain); }; const handleAnalyze = () => { if (!jobRole.trim() || !courseContent.trim()) { alert('Please enter both job role and course content.'); return; } setLoading(true); setResults(null); // 模拟返回已设定好的对齐结果 setTimeout(() => { setResults({ jobRole, courseDomain: 'Information Security', extractedSkills: [ 'Data Privacy Principles', 'Anonymization & K-Anonymity', 'GDPR Compliance', 'Privacy-by-Design', 'Privacy Risk Assessment', 'Differential Privacy', 'Privacy in AI and IoT', 'Data Governance', 'Privacy Frameworks (PIA, Policies)', 'De-identification & Pseudonymization' ], matchedSkills: [ 'GDPR Compliance', 'Privacy-by-Design', 'Anonymization & K-Anonymity', 'Data Governance', 'Data Privacy Principles', 'Differential Privacy', 'Privacy Risk Assessment', 'Privacy Frameworks (PIA, Policies)' ], missingSkills: [ 'ISO27001', 'Security Policies', 'Access Control' ], coverageRatio: 72 }); setLoading(false); }, 1500); } const getCoverageClass = (ratio) => { if (ratio >= 80) return 'coverage-high'; if (ratio >= 60) return 'coverage-medium'; if (ratio >= 40) return 'coverage-low'; return 'coverage-very-low'; }; return (
